thread.section_title: Arbor City Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Absolutely perfect!
thread.title_full: Absolutely perfect! - Review of Arbor City Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: vr1119
title: Absolutely perfect!
text: This was by far the best hotel we have ever stayed at. We were not disappointed. Everything is brand new, clean and beautiful. The staff was very friendly and we were automatically upgraded to a bigger bed because it was available. We didn't ask, they just did it because they could. The rooms were spacious and out view was lovely at night with the city lights. My boyfriend and I could not have asked for a better experience.
